DOC.brief_summary: A prospective case-control study of the clinical and radiographic outcome of periacetabular osteotomy in patients with and without preoperative acetabular labral tears.
DOC.brief_title: Acetabular Labral Tear in Dysplastic Hips
DOC.criteria: Developmental dysplasia of the hip contraindication for magnetic resonance arthrography severe deformities of the femural head
